introduction: WatchTranslations is a tool that allows you to get notification when a message about your favourite project in TranslateWiki is not translated into language of your choice.
success-edit: You successfully edited your watched component.
success-delete: You successfully deleted your watched component.
duplicate-edit: Could not edit: would create a duplicate watched component
preferences-frequency-hours: How frequently should the tool email you?
preferences-pref-language: Which should be your default langauge?
none-currently-watched: Click the button below to start watching new translations.
